title: Project-Based Education for Strengthening Scientific Communication Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Targeting current secondary science teachers, acquiring communication skills to effectively convey scientific knowledge to non-experts and mastering the use of latest media through project-based learning.

learning_goals: Learners acquire the ability to reconstruct scientific concepts into tailored language for diverse stakeholders (students, parents, general public).
Learners complete at least three projects that visually represent scientific information using digital media (videos, infographics, etc.).

Learners revise science communication strategies (reports/presentation materials) three or more times through peer review (with three or more team members) and formative assessments (weekly quizzes), achieving a score of 4/5 or higher in the final output for clarity, logical coherence, and visual effectiveness.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
